title: Starfox Calendar
description: Calendar application built with React, Vite, and TypeScript. Features scheduling, event management, and time-based organization tools.
summaryDescription: Starfox Calendar is a modern calendar application built with React, Vite, and TypeScript. The app provides comprehensive scheduling capabilities, intuitive event management, and powerful time-based organization tools. Designed with a focus on user experience and efficiency.

screenshots.caption: Main calendar interface with monthly view and sidebar navigation
Event creation form with date, time, and details
Monthly calendar grid showing scheduled events
Detailed event view with edit and management options
